html:
You can currently save $300 instantly on a pair of Macbook Pro laptops with M4 Pro processors. There is a limited quantity available with the instant discount.

These Macbooks are well equipped with 48GB of RAM and 1TB SSDs.

Purchase Options

  • Apple 14″ MacBook Pro (M4 Pro, Space Black) $2499 (Reg $2799)
  • Apple 16″ Macbook Pro (M4 Pro, Space Black) $2799 (Reg $3099)

Overview

  • Apple M4 Pro 14-Core Chip
  • 48GB Unified RAM | 1TB SSD
  • 16″ 3456 x 2234 Liquid Retina XDR Screen or 14″ 3024 x 1964 Liquid Retina XDR Screen
  • 20-Core GPU | 16-Core Neural Engine
  • Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) | Bluetooth 5.3
  • Thunderbolt 5 | HDMI | MagSafe 3
  • SDXC Slot | 12MP Center Stage Camera
  • Magic Keyboard, FT Trackpad, Touch ID
  • macOS with Apple Intelligence

Supercharged with their M4 Pro chip and Apple Intelligence, the space black Apple 14″ MacBook Pro offers a tremendous performance boost for researchers, developers, engineers, creative pros, or anyone that needs even faster performance for more demanding workflows.

The system features Apple’s M4 Pro 14-Core Chip, which is combined with a 20-Core GPU, Dynamic Caching, and hardware-accelerated ray tracing, all of which significantly increase performance for the most demanding pro apps and games.

Also featured is a 16-core Neural Engine with Apple Intelligence, a personal intelligence system that transforms how users work, communicate, and express themselves, all while protecting their privacy.

Purchase Options

  • Apple 14″ MacBook Pro (M4 Pro, Space Black) $2499 (Reg $2799)
  • Apple 16″ Macbook Pro (M4 Pro, Space Black) $2799 (Reg $3099)

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
